item.title: OpenAI 修复了使 Gmail 数据面临风险的 ChatGPT 安全漏洞
item.description: 据网络公司 Radware 的研究人员称，OpenAI 修补了一个 ChatGPT 安全漏洞，该漏洞可能允许黑客从用户那里提取 Gmail 数据。【原文：OpenAI patched a ChatGPT security flaw that could have allowed hackers to extract Gmail data from its users, according to researchers at cyber firm Radware.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博建议国际货币基金组织权衡下限定向贷款
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛建议国际货币基金组织考虑在低利率被证明效果不佳时，将定向贷款和有条件的前瞻性指导作为其针对经济体的政策框架的一部分。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong proposed that the International Monetary Fund consider targeted lending and conditional forward guidance as part of its policy framework for economies when low interest rates are proving less effective.】

item.title: 美联储降息后大科技股和小盘股上涨
item.description: 美国股市周四跳涨，因为在美联储今年首次降息并预示未来将有更多降息后，华尔街弥漫着风险偏好情绪。【原文：US equities jumped Thursday as a risk-on sentiment permeated Wall Street after the Federal Reserve delivered its first interest rate cut this year and signaled more ahead.】

item.title: 据说 ADS 正在就收购诺玛公司价值 10 亿美元的水务部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Advanced Drainage Systems 公司正在就收购德国诺玛集团（Norma Group SE）的水管理部门进行深入谈判，交易价值约为 8.5 亿欧元（10 亿美元）。【原文：Advanced Drainage Systems Inc. is in advanced talks to buy the water management unit of Germany’s Norma Group SE in a deal valued at about €850 million ($1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马里上诉法官释放被拘留巴里克员工的命令
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马里检察官已就法官下令保释巴里克矿业公司四名员工一事提出上诉。【原文：Malian prosecutors have appealed a judge’s order to release four Barrick Mining Corp.’s employees on bail, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通据称将帮助出售 2 亿欧元欧洲央行世界线债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司的高收益信贷交易柜台帮助安排了欧洲中央银行所持有的一笔 Worldline SA 债券的销售。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co’s high-yield credit trading desk helped arrange the sale of a block of Worldline SA bonds held by the European Central Bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿曼 Omran 公司将战略控股旅游巨头 TUI 公司
item.description: TUI AG 表示，阿曼国有企业 Omran 集团将成为这家德国旅游公司的战略股东，这也是海湾国家推动旅游业发展的一部分。【原文：TUI AG said Oman’s state-owned Omran Group will become a strategic shareholder in the German travel company, part of the Gulf nation’s drive to expand its tourism industry.】

item.title: 野马队老板在 StubHub IPO 中大获全胜，持股 17 亿美元
item.description: 一家由沃尔玛董事会主席联合创办的投资公司成为 StubHub 控股公司首次公开募股的最大赢家，该公司持有的 22% 股份价值近 17 亿美元。【原文：An investment company co-founded by the chairman of Walmart Inc.’s board emerged as the biggest winner of StubHub Holdings Inc.’s initial public offering, ending the day with its 22% stake valued at almost $1.7 billion.】

item.title: AT&T 希望出售至少 40 亿美元的高等级债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，AT&T 公司希望在本周三出售至少 40 亿美元的投资级债务。【原文：AT&T Inc. is looking to sell at least $4 billion of investment-grade debt Wednesday, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦认为欧元有机会在全球发挥更大作用
item.description: 管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escrivá）说，欧元作为全球货币可以打破美元霸权，并在唐纳德-特朗普领导下的美国经济政策的影响下获得力量。【原文：The euro can break the dollar hegemony as a global currency and gain strength as a consequence of US economic policies under Donald Trump, Governing Council member Jose Luis Escrivá said.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师称 Anthropic 的溢价定价面临风险
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Anthropic PBC’s premium prices for its AI tools may not be sustainable in the long run because of increasing competition, according to a report by JPMorgan Chase & Co. that initiated analyst coverage of the company.】

item.title: 南非维持利率不变，支持降低 CPI 目标
item.description: 南非央行维持借贷成本不变，即使通胀率低于预期，使政策制定者更接近 3% 的目标。【原文：South Africa’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged, even as cooler-than-expected inflation brought policymakers closer to the 3% target at which they now aim.】

item.title: 英国警方指控两人参与持续数周的伦敦交通黑客事件
item.description: 英国当局已就去年造成伦敦交通网络瘫痪数周的网络攻击指控两名男子。【原文：British authorities have charged two men over a cyberattack that disrupted London’s transport network for several weeks last year.】

item.title: 咖啡价格大幅波动将波动率推至四年新高
item.description: 本周咖啡价格大起大落，其原因包括对巴西咖啡供应紧张的担忧、关税以及获利回吐，这使得纽约期货市场的波动达到四年来的最高点。【原文：Coffee’s big price swings this week — driven by worries over tighter supplies in Brazil, tariffs and then profit-taking — has driven volatility in New York futures to a four-year high.】

item.title: 从 SNL 到 SEC：狗币获得交易所交易基金（ETF），备忘录交易成为主流
item.description: 2021 年 5 月，当埃隆-马斯克登上《周六夜现场》的舞台时，他咧嘴笑着演小品，抛出暗示，并在全国电视直播中点名 Dogecoin，从而将一个网络笑话载入了金融史册。在他登台之前，Dogecoin 的价格一路飙升，随后暴跌。【原文：When Elon Musk took the stage on Saturday Night Live in May 2021, he grinned through sketches, dropped innuendos and pumped an internet joke into financial history by name-checking Dogecoin live on national television. The coin soared before his appearance — then crashed.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数创近四年来最大降幅
item.description: 美国首次申请失业救济的人数创下近四年来的最大降幅，扭转了前一周异常大幅飙升的局面，与经济中裁员人数较少的情况相一致。【原文：Initial applications for jobless benefits in the US dropped by the most in nearly four years, reversing an unusually large jump in the prior week and consistent with low levels of layoffs in the economy.】

item.title: Nothing 的新耳塞在外壳中加入麦克风
item.description: 以奇特的硬件设计而闻名的消费技术初创公司 Nothing Technologies Ltd. 为其新耳塞提出了一个不同寻常的主张：把外壳当作麦克风使用。【原文：Nothing Technologies Ltd., the consumer tech startup known for its quirky hardware designs, has an unusual pitch for its new earbuds: use the case as a microphone.】

item.title: 哈塞特支持美联储降息，称这只是个开始
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）周三对美联储降息25个基点的决定表示赞同，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统及其盟友曾要求美联储采取更大的举措。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett offered an endorsement of the Federal Reserve’s decision to cut interest rates by 25 basis points Wednesday, even after President Donald Trump and his allies had pressed for a bigger move.】

item.title: 英国里夫斯告诉英国央行降低通胀是预算目标
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，英国政府正在研究在 11 月公布下一份预算时降低通货膨胀的措施。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said the UK government was looking at measures to reduce inflation when it publishes its next budget in November.】

item.title: 萨默斯称美联储政策 "偏松"，通胀是首要问题
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）表示，美联储的政策倾向于过于宽松，并强调美国经济的最大风险在于通胀而非就业市场。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said Federal Reserve policy is leaning toward being too slack, emphasizing that the US economy’s biggest risks lie in inflation rather than the job market.】

item.title: 贝宝支持的 Pine Labs 计划在 10 月进行高达 7 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度数字支付服务提供商 Pine Labs Ltd. 计划在 10 月下半月进行首次公开募股，融资多达 7 亿美元。【原文：Pine Labs Ltd., a digital payments provider in India, plans to raise as much as $700 million from an initial public offering in the second half of October, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Man Group 通过对冲基金大众交易全力进军 ETF 市场
item.description: 世界上最大的上市对冲基金正在打破传统，以自己的名义涉足 ETF 领域。【原文：The world’s largest publicly listed hedge fund is breaking ranks with tradition — and stepping into the ETF arena under its own name.】

item.title: 经华盛顿特区批准，NFL 指挥官赢得 37 亿美元体育场交易
item.description: 随着市政府官员批准了一项耗资约 37 亿美元的计划，在 RFK 体育场的场地上建造一座新的体育馆和综合开发项目，华盛顿司令队在阔别三十年后将正式重返哥伦比亚特区。【原文：The Washington Commanders are officially returning to the District of Columbia after a three-decade hiatus, with city officials approving a roughly $3.7 billion plan for a new stadium and mixed-use development on the grounds of RFK Stadium.】

item.title: 米莱赌局褪色，阿根廷经纪人损失惨重
item.description: 当地资产的下滑、挥之不去的资本管制以及仍被外国投资者避之不及的经济，使阿根廷资本市场繁荣的希望破灭，这对那些在哈维尔-米莱总统两年前上任后押注阿根廷经济复苏的小型经纪公司造成了压力。【原文：A slide in local assets, lingering capital controls and an economy still shunned by foreign investors are deflating hopes for a boom in Argentina’s capital markets, weighing on small brokerage firms that had bet on a revival after President Javier Milei took office two years ago.】

item.title: Uber 投资 Flytrex，重回无人机送货领域
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. 将与 Flytrex Inc. 合作试用无人机送餐，这标志着这家共享出行巨头重返物流实验领域。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. will trial food deliveries by drone with Flytrex Inc., marking the rideshare giant’s return to experiments with logistics.】

item.title: Waymo 和 Via 将在亚利桑那州提供自动驾驶公共交通服务
item.description: 上周五上市的公共交通软件制造商 Via Transportation Inc. 将与 Waymo 合作，于今年秋天在亚利桑那州推出自动驾驶共享乘车服务。【原文：Via Transportation Inc., the public transit software maker that went public last Friday, will partner with Waymo to launch autonomous shared rides in Arizona this fall.】

item.title: 乌克兰电信公司在纳斯达克的首次亮相得益于战时的应变能力
item.description: 在纳斯达克的开市仪式上，总理和祈祷者的身影并不多见。不过，乌克兰公司在美国证券交易所上市也同样罕见。【原文：It’s not often that the Nasdaq’s market-opening ceremony includes a prime minister and a call to prayer. Then again, it’s just as rare for a Ukrainian company to list on an American stock exchange.】

item.title: 印度可能终于准备好进入原子时代
item.description:
经过多年的推诿，立法者可能会让投资者更容易将赌注押在核电上。【原文：

After years of prevarication, lawmakers might be about to make it easier for investors to bet on nuclear power. 

】

item.title: 阿波罗利用复杂债务工具向保险公司寻求 100 亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is set to use a rare structure to raise $10 billion from insurers, people with knowledge of the matter said, in the latest illustration of the increasing ties between private capital and annuity providers.】

item.title: 波兰工资增长放缓为 10 月降息创造条件
item.description: 波兰 8 月份的工资增长速度是 2021 年以来最慢的，低于分析师的预期，并增加了下个月降息的可能性。【原文：Wages in Poland grew their slowest since 2021 in August, coming in below analysts’ expectations and raising the prospect of an interest rate cut next month.】
